meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Russia and some other Slavic countries, equal to one hundredth of a ruble.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny copeck on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She only had a copeck left in her pocket.
meanings.sent3: The copeck rolled away like a tiny wheel.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were worth less than a copeck.
meanings.sent5: The copeck glinted in the sunlight, a tiny treasure.

meanings.sent1: He saved every copeck he earned.
meanings.sent2: She didn't have a copeck to spare.
meanings.sent3: The copeck seemed to mock him from the bottom of his wallet.
meanings.sent4: Time was slipping away, each moment costing a copeck.
meanings.sent5: The copeck dropped into the jar, a small sound but a big step towards his goal.
